TextView.android:text: An offbeat and less-crowded hill station located in the Nandurbar district of Maharashtra, approx. 379 km away from Gujarat Hill Station Toranmal is a home to unparalleled natural beauty. Offering exquisite views of the verdant grasslands, hills, lakes, forests and waterfalls, Toranmal is inhabited by a variety of flora and fauna. The place is also famous for its Gorakhnath Temple, which is a popular pilgrimage sites during the grand festival of Maha Shivratri. To experience the natural beauty of Toranmal at its best, visit this place during September to March but avoid visiting it during the night as it is quite foggy here after dark.
